          EPOS. We Provide The Features You Need.

           
           
           

          INVENTORY MANAGEMENT

          PRODUCTS

          PROMOTIONS

          INTEGRATIONS

          DATA MINING AND ANALYTICS

          SECURITY

          MULTI OUTLETS

          F&B SPECIAL FEATURES

          CRM

          PAYMENT

          REPORTING

          Inventory Management

          LOW QUANTITY ALERT


          Set alerts on a specific quantity for individual products to prevent out of stock situations.

           
           
           

          AUTOMATED STOCK COUNT


          Our inventory management software automatically updates your stock count when a sale or purchase order is made. You can cross-check the automated count with your physical stock count to spot discrepancies.

           
           
           

          ORDER EXPRESS


          Use the EPOS forecast tool to generate and send purchase orders based on lead time, estimated sales trend and on-hand quality.

           
           
           

          SUPPLIERS


          Create and assign suppliers to products and generate purchase orders with ease.

           
           
           

          Products

          PRODUCT CONFIGURATION


          Create or upload your products with a wide range of options for customization, such as variant, image, inventory and promotion, allowing you to list your products in a detailed manner.

           
           
           

          PRODUCT NATURE


          Categorise your products into composite, add-on, packages, serial number or weighing scale to suit their nature.

           
           
           

          BULK IMPORT NEW PRODUCTS


          Easily add hundreds of products using excel sheets.

           
           
           

          Promotions

          MANAGE PROMOTIONS


          Create and apply specific promotions or discounts to individual products giving you full control of your store’s sales campaign.

           
           
           

          MANUAL DISCOUNT


          Cashiers can choose to input manual discounts at the checkout menu for special promotions.

           
           
           

          BLACKLISTING MANUAL DISCOUNTS


          Blacklist certain items and give them manual promotions at the checkout menu.

           
           
           

          PRICE BOOKS


          Apply special discounts to specific customer groups, outlets, periods or all of the above.

           
           
           

          Integrations

          ECOMMERCE INTEGRATION


          Merge your online and physical stores through ecommerce integration with Shopify and WooCommerce, which allows you to sell your products without having to manage both individually.

           
           
           

          ACCOUNTING INTEGRATION


          Create financial statements with ease by integrating with accounting software such as Xero or Quickbooks. EPOS will sync your sales data with these platforms.

           
           
           

          Data Mining & Analytics

          SALES FORECAST


          Use historical sales data to predict sales for the next 7 days.

           
           
           

          AUTOMATED UPSELLING


          Provide highly relevant products at the checkout based on previous sales.

           
           
           

          MARKET BASKET ANALYSIS


          Highlight frequently sold products for some undiscovered bundle promotions.

           
           
           

          OUT OF STOCK ANALYSIS


          Calculate the potential loss in sales due to the out of stock product(s).

           
           
           

          SMART REORDERING


          Use a recommended reorder amount calculated using your sales data and forecasted demand which reduces wastage.

           
           
           

          Security

          PRODUCT AUDIT


          Record every change made on an individual product, holding each user accountable for their actions.

           
           
           

          TRANSACTION AUDIT


          Record every change made on any transaction, holding each user accountable for their actions.

           
           
           

          Multi Outlets

          USER ACCOUNTS


          Create and add more users as your team grows.

           
           
           

          OUTLETS


          Add a new outlet and link it to your existing outlets and warehouse. Quick and easy.

           
           
           

          SYNCHRONISED DATA


          Find your reports, inventory, customers and product data from all different outlets all in one terminal.

           
           
           

          F&B Special Features

          QR CODE ORDERING


          Allow customers to order via a QR code from their table.

           
           
           

          TABLE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM


          Take orders and assign them to tables for a straightforward check-out process.

           
           
           

          SET MENU


          Easily create new menus, add products and configure the menus to your liking.

           
           
           

          KITCHEN DISPLAY SYSTEM


          Use Kitchen Display System to directly sent the customers’ orders to the kitchen.

           
           
           

          FOOD DELIVERY INTEGRATIONS


          It works with FoodPanda, Deliveroo, and Grabfood.

           
           
           

          APPOINTMENT BOOKING MODULE


          It takes customers’ reservations from the booking site, and lets users to manage tables and reservations directly from EPOS platform.

           
           
           

          CRM

          MEMBERSHIP


          Create and categorise customers into particular groups based on their profile.

           
           
           

          CUSTOMER REGISTRATION


          Simple yet flexible customer registration that can be done on the spot, using the customers’ mobile number or email address.

           
           
           

          ONLINE REGISTRATION


          Allow your customer to register online through a sign-up link and sync their data with the POS system.

           
           
           

          BULK IMPORT YOUR CUSTOMER LIST


          Bring over all your old customers and their information using google excel sheets.

           
           
           

          LOYALTY PROGRAM


          Make it simple and fuss-free for your customers to join a loyalty programme that suits your business – be it a retail, an F&B outlet or a minimart.

           
           
           

          Payment

          MULTIPLE PAYMENT METHODS


          We accept a large variety of payment methods. Your customer can choose to pay by cash or go cashless – credit card payment, debit card payment, cheque, vouchers, coupons and gift cards.

           
           
           

          VOUCHERS


          Create voucher coupons which can be accepted during payment at the checkout.

           
           
           

          NUMEROUS PAYMENT PARTNERS


          We accept payments from visa, master, paynow, paypal, etc.

           
           
           

          FLEXIBLE PAYMENT METHODS


          We allow split by item or split by pax payment methods to provide more options for customers to choose from.

           
           
           

          Reporting

          CUSTOMIZE YOUR REPORTS


          Choose the types of reports that you would like to see. Organise your data to improve productivity.

           
           
           

          DAILY SALES REPORTS


          Review and tally daily closing summaries and check back on sales history whenever needed.

           
           
           

          PRODUCT SALES REPORTS


          Make better decisions with sales reports by time period, product, supplier and more.

           
           
           

          INVENTORY REPORTS


          Manage your inventory effectively by monitoring inventory levels, inventory movement and stocks on hand.

           
           
           

          EXTRACT REPORTS


          Extract your reports into easy-to-view spreadsheets, for convenient tabulation and accounting.

           
           
           

          POS Systems In Singapore: Minimarts, Retail And F&B

          Available in Singapore, our vast array of features across our cloud POS (Point Of Sale) systems strive to enhance business operations – for all kinds of businesses, primarily retail organisations, minimarts and F&B outlets.
